titleStmt.title: A Charge and impeachment of high-treason against Sir John Geyer, Lord Mayor of London, Alderman Adams, Alderman Langham, Alderman Buns, Alderman Cullam, prisoners in the Tower of London together with the votes of the House of Commons, and the impeachment against Collonel Lawrence Bromfield, Collonel Iohn Hooker, and Captain Jones ...

A Charge and impeachment of high-treason against Sir John Geyer, Lord Mayor of London, Alderman Adams, Alderman Langham, Alderman Buns, Alderman Cullam, prisoners in the Tower of London together with the votes of the House of Commons, and the impeachment against Collonel Lawrence Bromfield, Collonel Iohn Hooker, and Captain Jones ...

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
